>
[Basic Modification](/Feats.aspx?ID=3117) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Inventor](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=108)

**Prerequisites**
[Inventor Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3112)

</column>

---

You've learned to modify your innovation in order to enhance its capabilities beyond what an ordinary piece of equipment can accomplish. You gain a basic modification of your choice for your [innovation](/classes/inventor/innovations). Your innovation must meet any requirements for the modification you choose, as normal.
